definition: lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: wei4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
